CREATE TABLE application.story_users( story_id bigint NOT NULL, user_id bigint NOT NULL,
CONSTRAINT su_pk PRIMARY KEY (story_id, user_id), CONSTRAINT su_story_fk FOREIGN KEY (story_id) REFERENCES application.story (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE NO ACTION ON DELETE NO ACTION, CONSTRAINT su_users_fk FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES application.users (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE NO ACTION ON DELETE NO ACTION )
